title: Corvette Z06 vs Tesla P85D vs NASCAR - American Speed Promo for /DRIVE on NBCSN
description: /DRIVE on NBC Sports explores American Speed with a trip to Daytona International Speedway to experience NASCAR at 180mph, Mike Spinelli goes to Kennedy Space Center to find out America's future space endeavors, and Matt Farah drives the new Corvette Z06 in Kentucky.
tags: Chevy Corvette, Z06, Tesla P85D, drag race, Tesla vs. Corvette
